# sm::mathconst<>
{: .no_toc }
## Templated mathematical constants
{: .no_toc }

```c++
#include <sm/mathconst>
```
Header file: [<sm/mathconst>](https://github.com/sebsjames/maths/blob/main/sm/mathconst).

**Table of Contents**

- TOC

## Summary

Templated mathematical constants in the `sm` namespace.
